long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly resume any previously watched video with just one click, regardless of the website.

Key features:
- Snackbar for resuming playback from the last watched position.
- Popup displaying video watch history.
